text: Patrizia Piovesan Silva is a Venezuelan fencer. In 2019, she won the silver medal in the women's épée event at the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru. She also won the bronze medal in the women's team épée event. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Venezuelan female fencers Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Venezuela Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Venezuela Category:Pan American Games medalists in fencing Category:Fencers at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Patrizia Piovesan
